experience.title: Rattish
experience.text: About Created for the CIHR Grant-awarded Blood Brain Barrier Lab in Halifax, Rattish simplifies rat behavioral data tracking. Built with C#, it integrates video playback, real-time key tracking, and automated Excel export, offering precise timestamps, seamless data management, and an intuitive interface

experience.title: RATLab
experience.text: Software designed to streamline rat data tracking and automate the creation of Excel spreadsheets using .NET WindowsForms. This tool enhances efficiency by integrating data management and reporting features seamlessly.
